extends IFloodlightService

    • Method Detail

      • getAllSwitchMap

        java.util.Map<DatapathId,IOFSwitch> getAllSwitchMap()
        Get's the switch map stored in the switch manager
        Returns:
        the map of switches known by the switch manager

      • getSwitch

        IOFSwitch getSwitch(DatapathId dpid)
        If the switch with the given DPID is known to any controller in the cluster, this method returns the associated IOFSwitch instance. As such the returned switches not necessarily connected or in master role for the local controller. Multiple calls to this method with the same DPID may return different IOFSwitch references. A caller must not store or otherwise rely on IOFSwitch references to be constant over the lifecycle of a switch.
        Parameters:
        dpid - the dpid of the switch to query
        Returns:
        the IOFSwitch instance associated with the dpid, null if no switch with the dpid is known to the cluster

      • getActiveSwitch

        IOFSwitch getActiveSwitch(DatapathId dpid)
        If the switch with the given DPID is known to any controller in the cluster, this method returns the associated IOFSwitch instance. As such the returned switches not necessarily connected or in master role for the local controller. Multiple calls to this method with the same DPID may return different IOFSwitch references. A caller must not store or otherwise rely on IOFSwitch references to be constant over the lifecycle of a switch.
        Parameters:
        dpid - the dpid of the switch to query
        Returns:
        the IOFSwitch instance associated with the dpid, null if no switch with the dpid is known to the cluster OR if the switch status is not considered visible.

      • getSwitchRepresentations

        java.util.List<SwitchRepresentation> getSwitchRepresentations()
        Get the REST representations of the active switches.
        Returns:
        Representation wrappers of the active switches.

      • getSwitchRepresentation

        SwitchRepresentation getSwitchRepresentation(DatapathId dpid)
        Get the REST representation of a switch.
        Parameters:
        dpid - the dpid of the desired switch representation.
        Returns:
        The switch representation.

      • getAllSwitchDpids

        java.util.Set<DatapathId> getAllSwitchDpids()
        Returns a snapshot of the set DPIDs for all known switches. The returned set is owned by the caller: the caller can modify it at will and changes to the known switches are not reflected in the returned set. The caller needs to call getAllSwitchDpids() if an updated version is needed. See #getSwitch(long) for what "known" switch is.
        Returns:
        the set of DPIDs of all known switches

      • getSwitchHandshakeHandlers

        java.util.List<OFSwitchHandshakeHandler> getSwitchHandshakeHandlers()
        Gets an immutable list of handshake handlers.
        Returns:
        an immutable list of handshake handlers.
